title: Guys plz check this out and post what you think

embed.description: I STILL LACK A SET NAME FOR THIS GUY >___> Anyway. Imma call him Kaze, Breaker of the Winds for now (yes, cheesy aye, Kaze means Wind directly in Japanese......or cold...in terms of when you catch a cold). Pronounced \"Kahz-aye\" or \"Kah-zay\" Also, the Asterix * stands for degrees.
